title: D'Andre Wood
text:
D'Andre Wood (born December 16, 1988) is a former American <a href="college">college</a> <a href="American%20football">football</a> <a href="cornerback">cornerback</a> and a current student at <a href="Belhaven%20University">Belhaven University</a> in <a href="Jackson%2C%20Mississippi">Jackson, Mississippi</a>. He is a highly decorated player with football achievement and quickly drew attention with his athletic running and jumping after running a sub 4.4 forty yard dash and jumping a 10'9 in the broad jump. He also tested a 4.19 short shuttle and 38 inch vertical.
He has been invited to play in the South Carolina College Football Senior Bowl. He is the only NAIA players in the game.
